title: Punching keys
creator_credit: Sally Ingleton and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A biting dramatisation of the effects of the new technology in deskilling the female office workforce, alienating women from the products of their labour, and rendering them replaceable by cheaper labour overseas. Cast includes a young Gina Riley.
creator_credit_for_label: Sally Ingleton and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
